title: Little Abitur - Mala Matura 1947 [2010] audio pl, english subs
description:
Little Abitur - Mala Matura 1947 [2010] audio pl, english subs

Movie tells the story of a young boy who runs away at the end of the war with his family from Lviv to Krakow to take an interrupted education at secondary school. Sobieski. There, while undergoing a period of rebellion soon after II WW in new country "People's Republic of Poland", it must be found in the new reality. At the start of the film the young man is 14 years (1945 years), and the picture ends his little Abitur (1947 year)
